data.text: @Fla_Pol @GovRonDeSantis @AGGancarski Curious if Ronny made sure that all the medical staff that tended to his wife’s cancer went maskless, even in the operating room? Mask theater must be everywhere.
@Fla_Pol @GovRonDeSantis @AGGancarski I'll tell him where to put his damned mask

@Fla_Pol @GovRonDeSantis @AGGancarski How many people died of Covid today, ages, vaxed, not vaxed? Oh that’s right this asshole doesn’t think we have a right to know! Free Florida! Free is a verb in this context!
